thread.title: OPEC Discusses Improving Its Public Image, Internal Report Says
thread.title_full: OPEC Discusses Improving Its Public Image, Internal Report Says - WSJ

author: Benoît Faucon
title: OPEC Discusses Improving Its Public Image, Internal Report Says
text:
LONDON—The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries is worried about its public image.
Over the past year, OPEC officials have fretted over legal attacks on the group, wondered whether they should engage in social media and pushed for better relations with Asian consumers, according to internal reports viewed by The Wall Street Journal.
Overall, the producers group, which much of the world remembers for a crippling...
